sentences.english: Soft pliable lid provides leak resistant seal.
sentences.chinese: 柔軟蓋板，蓋合嚴實不泄露。

sentences.english: This top fits over the bottle and keeps the teat sterile .
sentences.chinese: 這個蓋子嚴實地蓋在奶瓶上，保持奶嘴無菌。

sentences.english: The jar must be well sealed.
Beautiful and tight seal between door leaf.
sentences.chinese: 門板間密封條美觀，嚴實。

sentences.english: The houses all stood silent and sturdy with windows curtained.
sentences.chinese: 所經過的屋舍都靜靜無聲，嚴嚴實實地落着窗簾。

sentences.english: Column-free building, the simple structure of the Liang Jia, Yan Shi link.
sentences.chinese: 樓內無柱，樑架結構簡潔，聯結嚴實。
大霧把山水景色籠罩了個嚴實。

sentences.english: Don't come to bed covered up from head to toe.
sentences.chinese: 上牀的時候千萬不要從頭到腳捂的嚴嚴實實。

sentences.english: Heavy coverings will trap moisture and keep the onions from drying fully.
sentences.chinese: 嚴實覆蓋物可以鎖住水分防止洋蔥完全曬乾。

sentences.english: He wrapped her up with great care, the night being dark and frosty.
sentences.chinese: 夜又黑又冷，以是他把她裹得嚴嚴實實的。

sentences.english: The television was sheathed in a snug coverlet.
sentences.chinese: 電視機用一個牀罩嚴嚴實實地蓋住了。

sentences.english: The harder the north wind blows, the tighter the man wraps himself.
sentences.chinese: 北風吹得越凜冽，那個人把衣服裹得越嚴實。

sentences.english: The double-broad canopy offers full coverage for two.
sentences.chinese: 兩頂巨大的傘蓋可以將情侶覆蓋的嚴嚴實實。

sentences.english: We packed the room so tight that one could not move an elbow without jostling somebody.
sentences.chinese: 我們在房子裏擠得嚴嚴實實，動動胳膊都會撞到別人。

sentences.english: We must have a tight ship, so we do not sink.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須要有一個嚴實的船體，這樣纔不會沉。

definition: to harbor evil designs/to harbor malicious intentions
to be unable to move a single step
to fiddle with/to tamper with/to meddle with/to move randomly/to flail about
to tie/bind or fasten together/to kidnap
half of sth/one side of sth
